assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Triheptanoin_InitialRenewal_INITIATION_Q7_R9
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: NOTE: SEVERE PAIN - DEFINED AS: EXERCISE INDUCED MUSCLE PAIN INTERFERING WITH ABILITY TO PARTICIPATE IN ACTIVITIES; OR EXERCISE INDUCED MUSCLE PAIN SUFFICIENT TO REQUIRE HOSPITALIZATION OR ER VISIT; OR MUSCLE PAIN REQUIRING THE USE OF NARCOTICS.
